string.name: name
string.value: First Evan Launch Gift from the Admin
The Maple Admin has prepared a gift for you to celebrate the launch of Evan. If you're curious about the gift, talk to the Maple Admin.
The Maple Admin has prepared 5 different cash items that look especially good on Evan. You can get the first item from the Maple Admin when you reach Lv. 17.
You have received your first Evan Launch Gift from the Admin.
Hello, Evan! I love to deliver good news! So I'm thrilled to tell you that I'm handing out special gifts to celebrate the launch of Evan. Are you interested?
You must be super curious, hehe. I've prepared a little something for those who are diligently playing Evan.

I am giving away 5 different pieces of Evan gear to Evans that are between Lv. 17 and 21. When you equip all five Evan cash items, you'll get a special effect! Talk to me once you're Lv. 17 and ready to collect your first gift!
It's a special gift that will be given out only until May 4th, so hurry over if you want it!
